H0.text: who designed the first toy released by nintendo. Masayuki Uemura

H1.text: who designed the first toy released by nintendo. Hiroshi Yamauchi

H2.text: who designed the first toy released by nintendo. Shigeru Miyamoto

H3.text: who designed the first toy released by nintendo. Gunpei Yokoi

A4.text: Gunpei Yokoi was the original designer of several notable Nintendo products, including the Ultra Hand toy.

A5.text: In 1966, Hiroshi Yamauchi, president of Nintendo, came to a hanafuda factory where Yokoi was working and took notice of a toy, an extending arm that Yokoi made for his own amusement during spare time while doing maintenance.
